item.description:
These actions are for authentication sessions as well as self-performed user account actions. 

User routes will be created for any action that isn't designed to only mutate "self"

This route as  well as:
Company Compliance, Company Positions  Compliance, Past  Due, Requirement History, Upload (in this directory)
Can take an employee_id as a query parameter to act as an employee, if the curret user is an  admin/owner for the same contracting organization.
